page.title: 13SERVICES IN GROVE.
page.content:
IN GROVE THERE ARE SERVICES LIKE BANKS, GREEN GROCER, OFF LICENCE, SUPERMARKET, AND OPEN AIR FACILITIES. THERE ARE TWO BANKS :LLOYDS AND BARCLAYS. IN BARCLAYS THE MANAGER IS MR JONES. WHEN YOU WANT TO GO ON HOLIDAY ABROARD YOU CAN CHANGE MONEY IN THE BANK. THE GREEN GROCER IS VERY HANDY SELLING FRUIT AND VEGETABLES. THE OFF LICENCE SELLS DRINKS AND SNACKS. THE SUPER MARKET SELLS ALL EVERY DAY THINGS. THERE IS A GARAGE. THERE ARE ALSO HOUSE TO HOUSE SERVICES LIKE MILK AND POST DELIVERIES, WINDOW CLEANERS,MEALS ON WHEELS, GENERAL SERVICES,ALPINE DRINKS, SOUTHERN ELETRICITY, CALOR GAS.THERE IS ALSO A POST OFFICE WHICH IS OPEN FIVE DAYS A WEEK. YOU CAN BUY STAMPS THERE.
BY JULIA GOMM & MARK SANDERS
